击中爆炸:
  Cooldown: 2
  Skills:
  - Projectile{ot=Shoot1;oh=Shoot2;oe=ShootEND;v=6;i=1;hR=1;vR=1;in=0.75;syo=1} @PlayerLocationsInRadius{r=15}
Shoot1:
  Cooldown: 0
  Skills:
  - effect:particles{particle=flame;radius=1;points=2;amount=18;hS=0.1;vS=0} @origin
Shoot2:
  Cooldown: 0
  Skills:
   - Explosion
ShootEND:
  Cooldown: 0
  Skills:
   - effect:particlering{particle=flame;radius=8;points=80;amount=1;y=0.6;hS=1;vS=0} @origin
   - effect:particles{particle=Huge Explosion;radius=4;points=20;amount=100;hS=1;vS=0} @origin
   - damage{amount=5} @PlayersNearOrigin{r=8}


射出一条火焰粒子  击中敌人范围爆炸 范围伤害


不要爱我  

@PlayerLocationsInRadius{r=15}判断怪物附近的玩家  范围内有玩家 就放技能
伤害调整在
- damage{amount=5} @PlayersNearOrigin{r=8}    这个的amount是技能伤害    {r=8}是击中后范围伤害
